textbox.html: <label for="text-basic">Text input:</label><input name="text-basic" id="text-basic" value="" type="text">

combo.html: <label for="select-choice-1" class="select">Select, native menu</label><select name="select-choice-1" id="select-choice-1"><option value="standard">Standard: 7 day</option><option value="rush">Rush: 3 days</option><option value="express">Express: next day</option><option value="overnight">Overnight</option></select>
